org.jhove2.core
Class JHOVE2

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.AbstractModule
          org.jhove2.core.JHOVE2
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable, Module
@Persistent
public class JHOVE2
extends AbstractModule

Singleton object that drives the characterization process. Widely referred to throughout the framework.

Author:
mstrong, slabrams, smorrissey

Method Detail

characterize

public Source characterize(Source source,
                           Input input)
                    throws IOException,
                           JHOVE2Exception
Characterize a Source unit by parsing its Input, without performing an identification step. This method will be used as a call-back by any format module that must recursively characterize components of a format instance.

Parameters:
source - Source unit
input - Source input
Returns:
source which has been characterized
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception
IOException

failFast

public boolean failFast(int numErrors)
Determine if the fail fast limit has been exceeded.

Parameters:
numErrors - Number of errors
Returns:
True if the fail fast limit has been exceeded

                    value="Configured commands.")
public List<Command> getCommands()
                          throws JHOVE2Exception

JHOVE2Exception

getMemoryUsage

@ReportableProperty(order=6,
                    value="Framework memory usage, in bytes.")
public long getMemoryUsage()
Get framework memory usage. This is calculated naively as the Java Runtime's total memory minus free memory at the time of method abstractApplication.

Returns:
Memory usage, in bytes

getSourceCounter

@ReportableProperty(order=5,
                    value="Source unit counter, by scope.")
public SourceCounter getSourceCounter()
Get counter to track number and scope of source units processed by the JHOVE2 framework.

Returns:
Source unit counter
